LanguageData.LWTP.RainAches.Label: Increased pain when rain/snow
LanguageData.LWTP.RainAches.ToolTip: Pain will double when the it rains or snows
LanguageData.LWTP.TempAches.Label: Increased pain when low temp
LanguageData.LWTP.TempAches.ToolTip: Pain will double when the temperature is 10 degrees lower than the seasonal average
LanguageData.LWTP.MorningAches.Label: Increased pain when recently awoken
LanguageData.LWTP.MorningAches.ToolTip: Pain will increase by up to 100% when recently awoken
LanguageData.LWTP.version.label: Installed mod-version: {0}
LanguageData.LWTP.VerboseLogging.Label: Verbose logging
LanguageData.LWTP.VerboseLogging.ToolTip: Verbose logging helps when looking for issues, will spam a lot in the log
